meanings.sent1: The mysterious illness was undiagnosable by all the doctors.
meanings.sent2: The undiagnosable symptoms puzzled the medical team.
meanings.sent3: The undiagnosable case made the doctors scratch their heads in confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her undiagnosable condition was like a riddle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The undiagnosable disease remained a medical enigma.

meanings.definition: Unable to be identified or determined as a specific condition or illness.
meanings.sent1: The undiagnosable rash left the dermatologist baffled.
meanings.sent2: The cause of his symptoms was undiagnosable despite numerous tests.
meanings.sent3: The undiagnosable problem with the car turned out to be a loose wire.
meanings.sent4: Her undiagnosable condition was a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The undiagnosable mystery kept the doctors guessing.
